items.title: Web Integrator Diploma

items.text: Acquired skills through 12 validated web development projects. Training focused on CSS/SCSS, HTML, JavaScript, SEO, and React/Redux.

items.text: Training in operating electric pallet trucks and stackers.

items.title: Head of Design
items.subtitle: CreatLinx, London
items.text: Co-founder of a blockchain/cryptocurrency startup. Responsible for recruitment, design validation, development, and strategic planning. Soft skills: versatility, adaptability, creativity.

items.text: Entertainer for children and families as well as bartender at a campsite during the summer season.

items.title: Barista
items.subtitle: Columbus, Strasbourg
items.text: Prepared and served hot and cold beverages along with pastries, managed cash transactions, and maintained cleanliness of the premises.

items.title: Cook & Waiter
items.subtitle: Factory & Co, Strasbourg
items.text: Independently or collaboratively prepared dishes. Demonstrated proficiency in assembling and cooking burgers, bagels, and salads. Managed order taking, table service, cash handling, and maintenance of the premises.

items.title: Retail Associate
items.subtitle: Auchan, Illkirch
items.text: Versatile employee in a supermarket's maintenance team. Responsible for restocking and maintaining shelves, assisting customers, and handling stock. Received training on specialized equipment.

items.title: Music
items.text: Guitar, piano, pad, Digital Audio Workstation (advanced proficiency in FL Studio and various audio plugins).

items.title: Profile
items.text: With a solid background in restaurant and customer service, I have worked as a barista and in various service roles. I have developed versatility, efficiency, and a strong sense of customer satisfaction. I aim to leverage my interpersonal skills and contribute to a friendly and dynamic environment. Simultaneously, I am engaged in freelance web development, an activity that fuels my curiosity and nurtures my creativity.
